data.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted Interview - Eric Darnell (2012)
data.meta_description: Interview with director Eric Darnell on Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted. 1. On Ben Stiller as Alex. 2. On Chris Rock as Marty. 3. On what audiences can expect.
